name: AnyCancellable
desc: A type-erasing cancellable object that executes a provided closure when canceled.

items.name: init(() -> Void)
items.desc: Initializes the cancellable object with the given cancel-time closure.

items.name: func store<C>(in: inout C)
items.desc: Stores this type-erasing cancellable instance in the specified collection.

items.name: func store(in: inout Set<AnyCancellable>)
items.desc: Stores this type-erasing cancellable instance in the specified set.

items.name: static func == (AnyCancellable, AnyCancellable) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two instances are equal, as determined by comparing whether their references point to the same instance.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
